attributes.action: Postpone MP’s 2018 summer holiday, until EU strategy resolved.
attributes.additional_details:
Vote for early start on House of Commons summer recess is discussed here: https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-44853464

Dates for House of Commons including summer recess: https://www.parliament.uk/about/faqs/house-of-commons-faqs/business-faq-page/recess-dates/

Evidence of government splits on EU withdrawal:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-politics-44854892
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-44857687
attributes.background: Summer recess ends on the 4th of September meanwhile Parliament and the government appear to be split on the issue of Brexit. This petition proposes to postpone the recess until such time an agreed position on EU withdrawal, or retention of EU membership beyond the March 2019 deadline is reached.
